function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in shipping containers from China","Impact":"Supply chain disruption, increased lead times, potential cost increase","Mitigation":"Diversifying suppliers, increasing local production, stockpiling inventory","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring systems, local production facilities, inventory management software","People":"Importers, construction firms, logistics companies","Owner":"Importers, construction firms, logistics companies"},{"Description":"Shutdown of international suppliers and logistics companies","Impact":"Material supply chain difficulties, reduced internationalization","Mitigation":"Diversifying suppliers, increasing local production, stockpiling inventory","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring systems, local production facilities, inventory management software","People":"Construction firms, international suppliers, logistics companies","Owner":"Construction firms, international suppliers, logistics companies"},{"Description":"Increased demand for distribution and warehouse space","Impact":"Scarcity of storage space, competition for space, increased costs","Mitigation":"Efficient inventory management, warehouse optimization, investment in automation","Technologies":"Inventory management software, warehouse automation, supply chain optimization tools","People":"Distribution companies, logistics companies, construction firms","Owner":"Distribution companies, logistics companies, construction firms"}]}
